name: Sub Atomic Delivey
description:
Your mission is to deliver pizza on time to another dimension, but if you stop, things go faster, avoid atoms, protons neutrons and photons to win more atomicPoints

 A bullet hell where you can't stop moving , about pizza delivery  through the quantum world 

Created for the platzi game jam - 2020

  • Designer, Art,  Dev - Rothbilly, ig : @rothbilly.design
  • Music - Charkmon,  ig:  @nanchark
  • Created in godot engine: https://godotengine.org/

Agradecimientos a @usmgames y a @franopx  usm games site on itch
